features: 9.1-fluid ounce pump bottle of liquid oil-free acne facial cleanser with salicylic acid acne medicine to treat acne and prevent future breakouts, revealing clearer skin in just 1 week
Face wash contains an uplifting pink grapefruit scent and naturally derived grapefruit extracts Plus Vitamin C
Face wash contains Micro-Clear technology and maximum strength salicylic acid acne medicine to powerfully fight breakouts, blackheads, and even acne marks
Oil-free salicylic acid cleanser targets acne-fighting power deep down into pore to remove oil, leaving skin feeling fresh
Face wash and cleanser from the #1 Dermatologist Recommended Acne Brand is specially formulated for acne-prone skin and will rinse clean without over-drying skin.
body.description: Get clearer skin in just 1 week with Neutrogena Oil-Free Acne Wash Pink Grapefruit Facial Cleanser. This acne face wash gets deep down into pores to remove oil, leaving skin feeling fresh. With Micro-Clear technology and maximum strength salicylic acid, this facial cleanser powerfully fights breakouts, blackheads, and even acne marks. This facial cleanser is formulated with naturally derived grapefruit extract Plus vitamin C. The oil-free grapefruit face wash formula rinses clean without over-drying.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Neutrogena Oil-Free Salicylic Acid Pink Grapefruit Pore Cleansing Acne Wash With an uplifting blast of grapefruit plus vitamin C, Oil-Free Acne Wash Pink Grapefruit Cream Cleanser is a rich, creamy lather that powerfully clears blemishes and blackheads. Eliminate oil and dirt without over-drying or irritating skin. Formulated with MicroClear, a technology to cut through oil quickly to speed acne medicine straight to the source of breakouts. Uplifting Pink Grapefruit scentVitamin CMicroClear Technology

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great face wash!
reviews.reviewText: I have used Clinique face wash for years & when I ran out this last time, I thought I would try something different. I love the smell of this face wash & it takes off so much more make-up than the Clinique brand that I’ve used for years. I highly recommend this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Chin Zits Gone!
reviews.reviewText: Okay so I have consistently gotten these horrible chin pimples that were huge and painful from the age of 25 until I purchased this wash (I’m 32 now). I continued to get these pimples throughout my pregnancy and postpartum. Finally tried this wash and the Acne moisturizer and haven’t had one in 3 months! I am such a fan. I even paid thousands of dollars to this acne place and the chin zits still came back. My face does get a little dry with this product so I do use Neutrogena Oil Free Moisturizer on top of the Acne Moisturizer. Then, I apply a lightweight sunscreen and only wear powder foundation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good daily face wash smells good to

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars One of my favorites!
reviews.reviewText: Not only does it leave my skin feeling soft and clean, it smells so good! I never walk away feeling like I need to wash my face again. Always feels so fresh and so clean

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This keeps my skin clear
reviews.reviewText: My doctor recommended a salicylic acid cleanser to keep my skin clear, and after trying several I have settled on this one as working the best. It has a light scent that doesn't haunt me all day or interfere with other scented products. It only takes a tiny amount so the bottle lasts a long time - so higher cost up front (this is slightly more expensive than some of the others) but lower cost overall. It works to reduce clogged pores without drying my skin out, leaving it feeling clean and smooth. Some of the other products I tried dried my skin out so badly that I had rashes from being too dry! And of course. The best is that my skin doesn't have messy eruptions every time my hormones shift! Very happy with this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My go to morning product
reviews.reviewText: This product has an amazing smell! It’s invigorating, and the benefit of salicylic acid is a plus. Keeps my skin clear. Will forever repurchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Ugh, what an odor
reviews.reviewText: Good at cleaning, but the odor is ghastly. Since your hands are busy washing your face, you can't, at the same time, hold your nose (which would help).

reviews.reviewTitle: Buena limpieza, remueve bien la suciedad y no deja residuos oleosos.
reviews.reviewText: Buen producto, decente precio, 200ml aguanta un buen rato.

Me limpió la cara como no tienen idea. Tengo cara grasosa y me dejó limpió hasta el siguiente día. Lo compré por su componente principal para evitar la formación de granos y espinillas y ha funcionado bastante bien.

• El bote es pequeño pero tiene muy buen tamaño.• Huele rico, la piel se siente fresca y con tan solo una gotita hace espuma suficiente.• En cuanto a la marca: ingrese a la página oficial del producto y me gustó porque puedes hacer un test para saber qué tipo de piel tienes, te recomiendan productos para tu tipo de piel, te informa que NO hacen pruebas en animales y también te indican que sus productos puedes encontrarlos en venta en esta aplicación, por lo que si son realmente de la marca.• Entrega en forma correcta y a tiempo.
Muy bueno, sientes una sensacion de alivio cada vez qur lo usas, pero asegurate de que sea apto para tu piel, o te va a irritar
Mi cutis es graso deja el cutis súper limpio, pero mi piel es sensible y me irrito, tuve que suspender su uso.
